document.full_text: a report from jpmorgan chase notes that companies hoping to compete with the apple ipad have gotten a lukewarm reception with consumers. as a result, production output has been reduced.
document.title: ipad rivals fail to gain traction, a report says
lines_and_colors: a report from jpmorgan chase notes that companies hoping to compete with the apple ipad have gotten a lukewarm reception with consumers. as a result, production output has been reduced.
